articles.title: Michael Cohen pressed on his crimes and lies as defense attacks key Trump hush money trial witness
articles.description: Donald Trump's lawyers accused the star prosecution witness in his hush money trial of lying to jurors, portraying Trump fixer-turned-foe Michael Cohen on Thursday as a serial fabulist who is bent on seeing the presumptive Republican presidential nominee behind bars. (AP video by John Minchello) (AP produced by Javier Arciga)

articles.content:

articles.title: America's trade wars will intensify under Biden or Trump
articles.description: Biden's new China tariffs are only the beginning. Giant loopholes still allow Chinese manufacturers to enter the US market and undercut domestic competitors.
articles.content:
